instrument.description: The instrument the injection belongs to

name.description: The datasource where the item is stored

category.description: The sample category based on the eWorkflow definition (e.g. header, footer, bracket etc)

cas_registry_number.description: Chemical Abstracts Service registry number of the component entered in the component table.

checmical_formula.description: Chemical formula of the component entered in the component table.

c0.description: Y Offset of the calibration curve defined in the Peak Group Table (as Calibration Type).

c1.description: Linear Coefficient of the calibration curve defined in the Peak Group Table

c2.description: Quadratic Coefficient of the calibration curve defined in the Peak Group Table

c3.description: Cubic Coefficient c3 of the calibration curve defined in the Peak Group Table.

linear_retention_index.description: Linear Retention Index defined in the component table.

blank_run_injection.description: Selected information about the blank run injection

comparison_scoring.description: Results of a comparison of peak amounts obtained from two discrete detector channels

fixed_calibration_update_operator.description: Operator of the last update of the fixed calibration standards

fixed_calibration_update_time.description: Time of the last update of the fixed calibration standards.

fixed_calibration_standards_origin.description: Original location of calibration standards in Fixed mode.

blank_run_subtraction.description: Chromatogram subtraction settings specified in the method.

amount_ratio_flag_state.description: State of the amount ratio flag in the processing method ("On"/"Off").

group_evaluation.description: Defines how a peak group is evaluated

c0.description: Y Offset of the calibration curve defined in the Peak Group Table (as Calibration Type).

c1.description: Linear Coefficient of the calibration curve defined in the Peak Group Table

c2.description: Quadratic Coefficient of the calibration curve defined in the Peak Group Table

c3.description: Cubic Coefficient c3 of the calibration curve defined in the Peak Group Table.

auto_noise.description: Noise-level used by the automatic detection of the baseline in the Cobra peak detection.

concentration.description: Concentration (if Amount is really an amount): amount / injection volume

retention_factor.description: Ratio of the net retention time to the dead time (Capacity Factor).

peak_to_valley_ratio.description: Ratio for a peak in an unresolved peak group.

statistical_moments.description: Zeroth, First, or Second Moment of the separation.
